Title: Authorizes and directs the department of health to update the report entitled "New York State Department of Health Building Resilience Against Climate Effects (BRACE) in New York State"
Summary: Authorizes and directs the department of health to update the report entitled "New York State Department of Health Building Resilience Against Climate Effects (BRACE) in New York State".
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing and directing the department of health to update the report entitled "New York State Department of Health Building Resilience Against Climate Effects (BRACE) in New York State"
